name: Fury of the Red Queen
description:
The Red Queen has laid siege to the castle of the great King Maverick! The King is desperately trying to protect his kingdom, but what is more important - the beautiful Princess. 

It is a tower defense game. Press SPACE to view all the building spots, tap one to build a Tower. Tap a Tower to upgrade it. Your Gold is limited in the beginning - kill monsters to earn more. 

Good luck!
